member.name: T:Puzzles.Flow.Analytics.Analyzer
member.summary: Represents an analyzer.

member.summary: Indicates whether analyzer will check on touchness.

member.summary: Indicates whether analyzer will check on stranded cases.

member.summary: Indicates whether analyzer will check on dead-end cases.

member.summary: Indicates whether analyzer will search for outside-in cases.

member.summary: Indicates whether analyzer will search fast forwardly.

member.summary: Indicates whether analyzer will explore penalized cases.

member.name: P:Puzzles.Flow.Analytics.Analyzer.ReorderColors
member.summary: Indicates whether analyzer will automatically adjust colors in searching experience.

member.name: P:Puzzles.Flow.Analytics.Analyzer.ReorderOnMostConstrained
member.summary: Indicates whether analyzer will automatically adjust colors via constrainted priority.

member.summary: Indicates whether analyzer will force the first color as start.

member.summary: Indicates whether analyzer will randomize colors.

member.name: P:Puzzles.Flow.Analytics.Analyzer.UsesBestFirstSearch
member.summary: Indicates whether analyzer will use best-first search (BFS) rule to check grid.

member.summary: Indicates the maximum memory usage in mega-bytes.

member.summary: Indicates the number of bottleneck limit.

member.name: P:Puzzles.Flow.Analytics.Analyzer.MaxNodes
member.summary: Indicates the number of maximum nodes can be reached.
